night this event back in 2012 this is
going on open government Chicagoland
hack night a hack event I was a monthly
event people like me were showing up to
it there's nothing called urban geek
drinks where everyone basically got
together at a bar every month and drank
and talked about civic stuff this was
new ah the city of Chicago data portal
city had started releasing data for the
very first time there was this this is
the first hackathon I ever attended it
was a google it was sponsored by the
city and google it was called the

p.span: chicago open data hack day as a place

the open date of the city is releasing
after that I decided to start a group

tracking what lobbyists are doing we

budget haha we also build a website for
knowing we just launched this but for
knowing what tier you live in so you
know how to apply for your chicago
public schools this stuff was all being
done outside of our normal nine-to-five
jobs and we were meeting in coffee shops
and randomly scheduling time to meet on
weekends and it got to be a pain and so
we decided why not just meet at the same
time in same place every week and so
this is a the earliest record I could
ever find of us talking about hack night
it's from March twentieth 2012 me and
